text:
Company Background:
Burgess Inc is a leading player in the office supplies industry, dedicated to providing top-notch services and products to our clients. Our team is passionate about achieving excellence and innovation in every project we undertake.

Job Title:
Clerical Aide

Job Description:
We are seeking a Clerical Aide to join our dynamic team. This role involves handling various clerical tasks including data entry, filing, and managing correspondence. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, organized, and capable of working independently.

Responsibilities:
- Perform data entry tasks with accuracy and speed.
- Organize and maintain filing systems.
- Manage incoming and outgoing correspondence.
- Assist in preparing reports and documents.
- Provide general administrative support as needed.

Qualifications and Experience:
- High school diploma or equivalent required.
- Must not be a drama queen; ability to maintain a professional demeanor at all times.
- A current driver’s licence is mandatory for all applicants.
- Preference for individuals who regularly attend church services.
- Candidates with a clean criminal background preferred.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive pay: We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 30,000 to USD 40,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Health and dental insurance.
- Retirement plan with company match.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Opportunities for career advancement.
